creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: blocky black and white image divided in sections; figure at R with head tilted; foundry workers at lower portion of image pouring metal and hammering; figures stoking fires at C, and driving poles; text around C; at top, a female figure delivers a box to a seated figure at L
inscription:
at top: 辨当運び
in center: 一、たたら　踏み〱　やがえふ　歌や　ヤガエフ　鋳も　湯となる　釜となる
at bottom: 湯つぎ
portfolio: From Ironmonger's Marching Song (Yagaefu やがえ節)
title: Third song (part 5)
